trans-unit.source: Open source home automation platform that puts local control and privacy first. We are able to track and control all devices at home and offer a control by voice and automating the control.
trans-unit.target: 开源家庭自动化平台,将本地控制和隐私放在首位。我们能够跟踪和控制家中的所有设备,并提供通过语音和自动化的控制。

trans-unit.source: Open-source home automation platform running on Python 3.
trans-unit.target: 在Python 3上运行的开源家庭自动化平台。
